Author: Lauda
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: No; 'add' should add them permanently to your list of peers; 'onetry' just attempts the connection right away.   - When the release of 1.3.0. version? i didn't find it in GitHub releases page. As soon as new seed nodes are deployed in another two countries I should start building; hopefully within a few days at most.  Quote from: EvRo74 on February 04, 2019, 09:28:55 PM It is unfortunate that in the current version of the wallet there is no function to do this with one click, as in many other coins with MNs. It would be great if the developers implemented such a function in the new wallet version. Although you say that there is no need to ban the wrong masternodes, I believe that this is not the case. Incorrectly working MNs can lead us to the wrong chains under certain circumstances. In this particular case, misbehaving nodes can't get you synced with the fork chain. If you use a new client and even if you are connectly to old misbehaving/old peers you will get stuck at block 2xxxxx something (I don't remember the exact number now). At that point you would be stuck forever (i.e. never synced up with the fork chain either) until you manually resolved it by fetching blocks that don't break consensus rules. Anyhow, 1.3.0 should block connections to pre 1.2.0 nodes.  Quote from: EvRo74 on February 04, 2019, 09:28:55 PM Be so kind as to give an example of a console command to ban one or another masternode. Code: setban 0.0.0.0 add 864000 This would ban the IP 0.0.0.0 for 864000 seconds.

Author: EvRo74
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: It seems that we did not understand each other. English is not my native language, so I apologize for any misunderstandings or ambiguous interpretations. When staking coins, as a rule, there is a certain time of maturation of coins (coinmature), after the expiration of which your stake becomes active again in the network. As far as I could understand, for this coin this value is somewhere between 67 and 119 confirmations (but, of course, it is not equal to 11 blocks). I will try to get a more accurate value as a result of further observations of the wallet, although it is customary for the developer to indicate these data in the announcement of the coin in the “specification” section.  Quote from: Lauda on February 04, 2019, 11:28:28 PM Quote from: EvRo74 on February 04, 2019, 09:28:55 PM Be so kind as to give an example of a console command to ban one or another masternode. Code: setban 0.0.0.0 add 864000 This would ban the IP 0.0.0.0 for 864000 seconds.  Thank you! This command works fine and I removed all the misbehaving masternodes.

In their final spreadsheets, my data is no longer there. Therefore, I legitimately consider this project a bounty scam and I will continue to talk about it to everyone.  I edited my post because, thanks to the distinguished @vividplatform my problem was successfully solved and I received my coins! https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3029249.msg49305102#msg49305102

Author: vividplatform
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Please send me a PM with additional details. The original bounty manager left abruptly without giving us warning, apologies for any issues you've had. We will get your issues sorted thanks for your time.    ---------------------- Updates for Vivid Platform ----------------------  Hello Vivid Community and Happy New Year! Crypto Bridge Deposits & Withdrawals are back online!  https://wallet.crypto-bridge.org/market/BRIDGE.VIVID_BRIDGE.BTC  Our first announcement of this year is an interesting one. In late November of last year we detected some unusual activity occurring on the Vivid Blockchain, it appeared that an individual was creating new coins from a small transaction - essentially minting coins out of thin air.  Within 24 hours the team, with support from the community, had identified all suspicious transactions. Additionally, the exploit the attacker was leveraging was identified in our code base. As Vivid is a descendant of the original Bitcoin, and more directly a fork of Bitcoin Green, it appears a prior error in their code base was carried over to Vivid Coin when it was created.  Shortly after, Crypto Bridge was contacted to disable the Vivid Wallet in their system, however the attacker was able to send 52,000 Vivid Coins to the exchange and sell. During this time, the team with awesome help from the community put forth an effort to fix the exploit and implement a hard fork in order to blacklist all funds created from the attacker.  In summary, the Vivid Blockchain was forked 27th Nov 2018 20:25:32 several days after the initial attack, freezing the attackers "magic coins", and hardening our Blockchain against any future attacks. The project alongside several generous whales have pooled 52,000 real replacement coins which were sent to Crypto Bridge, in order to correct their balance sheet from the frozen attacker coins. This was also to correct our max supply to its original specifications.  Thanks to the crack execution of our awesome community and internal team the issue was solved before it got out of hand. Due to the Holidays, it has taken Crypto Bridge some extended time to re enable wallets, however we are please to report withdrawals and deposits are back online!  If you have any questions or concerns please let the team know, and we are excited to start the new year off right with a great Beta application, hardened Blockchain, and lots more to come.  - Team Vivid   -------------------------  Check out our latest Medium Article overviewing the Spatial Computing landscape, and it's surrounding ecosystem!  Medium Article: Vivid AR Portfolio Part I: Spatial Computing https://medium.com/@vividtoken/vivid-ar-portfolio-part-i-spatial-computing-4f09c0c3162d

As a result of our personal communication, we came to an agreement and I accepted his apology for the actions and inaction of the first manager @Pelsjager, who did not do his job properly and, thus, created this problem.  @vividplatform was very attentive and kind to me and my problem. This is a great rarity now, when scamprojects are thriving around, which are deceiving their bounty participants or investors (and more often, those and others at once).  Therefore, I edit my previous post and share this amazing pleasant event here with great pleasure!  Dear @vividplatform, it was easy and pleasant for me to communicate with you, I am very grateful to you for your honesty and decency! It changes my attitude to the VIVID project as a whole and I will give you an example!  Good luck to the project and the community! I will gladly be your little part!

Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥

What are the minimum, maximum and optimal sizes of 1 input? What is the "stake split threshold"? Does this mean that when an input reaches a size of 2,000 or more coins - it is automatically split into 2 or more smaller ones? What is the annual ROI of POSmining? What is the term of coinmature? Body: Yes, thank you very much for being a very nice exception!  I would also appreciate your technical assistance on the questions I asked above (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3029249.msg49335634#msg49335634), as well as on the following: I see that some of the MNs do not work well in the VIVID network and use old versions of the wallet. How can I ban them?

Author: Lauda
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: I don't believe there is any data yet for this: The general consensus is, however, that e.g. 10x1k is better than 1x10k.   What is the "stake split threshold"? Does this mean that when an input reaches a size of 2,000 or more coins - it is automatically split into 2 or more smaller ones? Yes, the default is 2000 but you can change it yourself.   What is the annual ROI of POSmining? For every block of 5 Vivid, 4 goes towards MN's and 1 goes towards people staking. There's one block every minute; the rest you will be able to figure out on your own depending on the timeframes that you had in pine.   What is the term of coinmature? Are you asking what coinmature is or are you asking what the value of that is? 11 blocks I believe.  Quote from: EvRo74 on January 29, 2019, 12:00:21 AM -snip- I see that some of the MNs do not work well in the VIVID network and use old versions of the wallet. How can I ban them? There's no need to ban them. If you really wanted to, you could manually do so using the setban command or using the console (GUI).

Author: coupable
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Hi Yesterday i was in contact with manager from telegram about the paiement for the latest campaign of vivid and before sending the coins he asked me to upgrade my wallet. As i am not too much skilled with technical stuff, i just tried to follow the instructions from the manager who adviced me to copy the wallet.dat file before deleting the wallet folder then reinstalling the new wallet (upgraded version) and put the copied wallet.dat file into the new folder: The wallet is installed by default in appdata folder, when i try to paste the wallet.dat file, it shown an error that the folder is a "blacklisted folder". I uninstall it again and reinstall it by changing the installation folder to another directory, everything went smooth and the wallet.dat file was succefully pasted in the new wallet folder, but the wallet can't synchronize with the network, it keeps showing that no connected pairs and no blocks for scan (wallet not connected).  What is the problem and What to do?  *Today i contacted the telegram manager asking him to accept change in wallet address.

Author: Lauda
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Enter the following commands in order in the debug console: Code: addnode 144.202.17.231 add addnode 144.202.17.231 onetry addnode 144.202.65.82 add addnode 144.202.65.82 onetry Make sure your wallet version is 1.2.1; the no-connection issue should be (hopefully) fixed in 1.3.0.

Author: EvRo74
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Thank you for your answers!  It is unfortunate that in the current version of the wallet there is no function to do this with one click, as in many other coins with MNs. It would be great if the developers implemented such a function in the new wallet version. Although you say that there is no need to ban the wrong masternodes, I believe that this is not the case. Incorrectly working MNs can lead us to the wrong chains under certain circumstances.  Be so kind as to give an example of a console command to ban one or another masternode.  Thank you in advance!   Quote from: coupable on February 04, 2019, 04:53:35 PM Thank you Lauda It works good now. I am waiting for paiement, to confirm that the wallet works fine.  I would like to ask last questions: - Should i add those data to debug console everytime i want to log in ? - When the release of 1.3.0. version? i didn't find it in GitHub releases page.   - No, you don't have to do it again. - As far as I know, this version does not yet exist. Each team decides on its own - whether it is necessary to release a new version to solve any problems in the old version of the wallet. The task of the community is to monitor such updates and give feedback when finding bugs or any issues in the current versions.

Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: This project's main feature allows user to create, organize, and display your portfolio using augmented reality. In case you don't know what augmented reality means, it is "direct or indirect live view of a physical, real-world environment whose elements are "augmented" by computer-generated perceptual information." It's what Pokemon-Go used in catching pokemons using your mobile phone.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Vivid Announces Development of World’s First Social AR Network for Crypto Industry  2017 was an explosive year for cryptocurrency with over 1,300 currencies trading, a market cap peak of $700+ billion, and the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies and crypto trading. 2018 is expected to vastly improve on this.  With over 3.2 billion people currently online and dependent on a myriad of applications to remain connected, uptime and reliability remains the greatest concern for all — more so for cryptocurrency traders who can stand to loss out on market opportunities and cycles.  Vivid’s unified platform for AR and cryptocurrency brings together the best of both worlds, building a scalable platform that benefits both seasoned day traders, and newcomers alike. The device agnostic platform is being developed on a global redundant system architecture for an unparalleled degree of consistency for community driven content publishing.  Read the details in the article of Coinidol dot com, the world blockchain news outlet: https://coinidol.com/vivid-announces-social-ar-network/

Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Thank you!  There's a lot more to the project as well that we believe sometimes get's lost in the messaging (something we're currently working on).  For example there's a whole part of it that's focused on group/collaborative technical analysis and content creation. Think like Steemit but a little more focused on the market aspect of crypto. Between that, the augmented reality (a major viral and advertising play) and other unique functions we really believe we have a winner here.

Author: guccimane
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: Hello all! This is Ian Nott the CEO & Founder of Vivid. I'm excited to work with an amazing team to rethink how we interact with crypto and our communities, all while evolving how user experience in the spatial computing realm can expand our relationships with data and those we socialize with. Please feel free to ask any questions!

Author: guccimane
Title: [ANN] Vivid 🔥🔥 Augment Your Portfolio 🔥 CREATE, EARN AND SHARE 🔥🔥
Body: We are launching first on iOS and Android devices. And soon after on desktop. Since Windows Phone does not allow the modern inside out positional tracking found on leading smartphones we do not have plans at this time to support Windows Phone.
